Notes: Badass Creepers can be encountered in the Minecraft Easter Egg area of the Caustic Caverns.
* Your chances decrease if: Not all players wear: Vault Hunter's Relic, not playing on UVHM Level 73 or higher
The Grog Nozzle Pistol is bound to the The Beard Makes the Man quest. It scales with your level, but disappears after the quest is turned in.
The Gwen's Head Pistol has a 100% Chance to spawn in 1 of 5 boxes in The Dust.
Bring pictures to Moxxi.
The Lascaux SMG is found in a shallow pool in the first cave area of the Frostburn Canyon.
* Lil' Sis gives you the Little Evie if you kill Mr. Bubbles.

Notes: Omnd-Omnd-Ohk can be spawned by letting Witch Doctors evolve Badass Savages. Badass Savage>Super Badass Savage(100%)>Ultimate Badass Savage(100%)>Omnd-Omnd-Ohk(1%)
King Mong has a 66.7% Chance to spawn at 1 of 2 Locations in the Eridium Blight.
Pimon and Tumbaa have a 33% Chance to spawn in Wildlife Exploitation Preserve.
Rakkman is encountered after the side quest The Cold Shoulder is completed.
Sully the Blacksmith is encountered during the main quest of the T.K. Baha's Bloody Harvest. He doesn't respawn.
Badass Creepers can be encountered in the Minecraft Easter Egg area of the Caustic Caverns.
The M2828 Thumpson Assault Rifle randomly drops from a marked grave in Dahl Abandon.
If you took Mick Zaford's side only Tector and Jimbo Hodunk will respawn after the quest is completed.
Keep Varkids in battle and let them evolve 5 times: Larval ¬ª Adult ¬ª Badass ¬ª Super Badass ¬ª Ultimate Badass ¬ª Vermivorous
Warlord Slog spawns at the end of the final round of Magic Slaughter in Murderlin's Temple.

Clark the Cryptkeeper spawns after completing 4 tasks: 1: Defeat Jacques O'Lantern or the Pumpkin Kingpin. 2: Find 3 unique TVs in the Hallowed Hallow. 3: Destroy 6 red-eyed pumpkins scattered around Hallowed Hallow. 4: Use the Loot Cauldron. Each task ignites one of 4 torches.When all are lit, he spawns.
If you took Tector and Jimbo Hodunk's side only Mick Zaford will respawn after the quest is completed.
Once per character.
